Question: Can you list the full names of passengers who have booked first-class tickets for flights departing from San Francisco airport to London Heathrow in July 2023?
Cypher:
MATCH (departureAirport:Airport {name: "San Francisco Airport"})<-[departs:DEPARTS_FROM]-(flight:Flight)-[arrives:ARRIVES_AT]->(arrivalAirport:Airport {name: "London Heathrow"})
MATCH (flight)-[usesGate:USES_GATE]->(gate:Gate)<-[:HAS_TERMINAL]-(departureAirport)
MATCH (passenger:Passenger)-[booked:BOOKED_ON]->(reservation:Reservation)-[contains:CONTAINS_TICKET]->(ticket:Ticket)-[ticketForFlight:TICKET_FOR_FLIGHT]->(flight)
WHERE ticket.class = "First" AND departs.scheduledDeparture >= datetime('2023-07-01T00:00:00') AND departs.scheduledDeparture < datetime('2023-08-01T00:00:00')
RETURN passenger, booked, reservation, contains, ticket, ticketForFlight, flight, usesGate, gate, departs, arrives, departureAirport, arrivalAirport, passenger.firstName + ' ' + passenger.lastName
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (departureAirport:Airport {name: "San Francisco Airport"})<-[departs:DEPARTS_FROM]-(flight:Flight)-[arrives:ARRIVES_AT]->(arrivalAirport:Airport {name: "London Heathrow"})
MATCH (flight)-[usesGate:USES_GATE]->(gate:Gate)<-[relation10:HAS_TERMINAL]-(departureAirport)
MATCH (passenger:Passenger)-[booked:BOOKED_ON]->(reservation:Reservation)-[contains:CONTAINS_TICKET]->(ticket:Ticket)-[ticketForFlight:TICKET_FOR_FLIGHT]->(flight)
WHERE ticket.class = "First" AND departs.scheduledDeparture >= datetime('2023-07-01T00:00:00') AND departs.scheduledDeparture < datetime('2023-08-01T00:00:00')
RETURN passenger, booked, reservation, contains, ticket, ticketForFlight, flight, usesGate, gate, departs, arrives, departureAirport, arrivalAirport, passenger.firstName + ' ' + passenger.lastName
Semantic-EQL-Question: Can you provide a comprehensive list of all first-class passengers, including their names and ticket details, on flights from San Francisco Airport to London Heathrow during July 2023?
Rewrite: Could you provide the complete names of passengers who have reserved first-class seats on flights from San Francisco airport to London Heathrow in July 2023?

Question: What are the airport names and countries for the ending points of flights operated by 'SkyHigh Airlines' where the aircraft used is a Boeing 777?
Cypher:
MATCH (ending_airport:Airport)<-[arrives:ARRIVES_AT]-(flight:Flight)<-[operates:OPERATES]-(airline:Airline)
WHERE airline.name="SkyHigh Airlines" AND flight.aircraftType="Boeing 777"
RETURN ending_airport, arrives, flight, operates, airline, ending_airport.name, ending_airport.country
Rewrite: What are the names of the airports and their respective countries at the final destinations of flights run by 'SkyHigh Airlines' utilizing Boeing 777 aircraft?

Question: Identify the headquarters of airlines that operate flights with a duration of over 10 hours departing from JFK airport.
Cypher:
MATCH (departure_airport:Airport {name: "JFK"})<-[departs_from:DEPARTS_FROM]-(flight:Flight)-[operates:OPERATES]->(airline:Airline)
WHERE flight.duration > 10
RETURN departure_airport, departs_from, flight, operates, airline, airline.headquarters
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (departure_airport:Airport {name: "JFK"})<-[departs_from:DEPARTS_FROM]-(flight:Flight)-[operates:OPERATES]-(airline:Airline)
WHERE flight.duration > 10
RETURN departure_airport, departs_from, flight, operates, airline, airline.headquarters
Rewrite: Determine the locations of the main offices of airlines running flights longer than 10 hours from JFK airport.

Question: Please provide the names and passport numbers of passengers who have reserved business class seats on flights that use Gate 22 at Dubai International Airport.
Cypher:
MATCH (departure_airport:Airport {name: "Dubai International Airport"})<-[departs:DEPARTS_FROM]-(flight:Flight)-[uses:USES_GATE]->(gate:Gate {number: "22"})
MATCH (ticket:Ticket {class: "Business"})-[ticket_for:TICKET_FOR_FLIGHT]->(flight)
MATCH (passenger:Passenger)-[booked:BOOKED_ON]->(reservation:Reservation)-[contains:CONTAINS_TICKET]->(ticket)
RETURN departure_airport, departs, flight, uses, gate, ticket, ticket_for, passenger, booked, reservation, contains, passenger.firstName, passenger.lastName, passenger.passportNumber
Rewrite: Kindly supply the names and passport numbers of travelers booked in business class on flights assigned to Gate 22 at Dubai International Airport.

Question: Which airlines have flights that depart from Tokyo and arrive at Barcelona using an Airbus A380 aircraft, and what are the gate numbers for these flights?
Cypher:
MATCH (departure_airport:Airport {city:"Tokyo"})<-[departs_from:DEPARTS_FROM]-(flight:Flight {aircraftType:"Airbus A380"})-[arrives_at:ARRIVES_AT]->(arrival_airport:Airport {city:"Barcelona"})
MATCH (flight)-[operates:OPERATES]->(airline:Airline)
MATCH (flight)-[uses_gate:USES_GATE]->(gate:Gate)
RETURN departure_airport, departs_from, flight, arrives_at, arrival_airport, operates, airline, uses_gate, gate, airline.name, gate.number
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (departure_airport:Airport {city:"Tokyo"})<-[departs_from:DEPARTS_FROM]-(flight:Flight {aircraftType:"Airbus A380"})-[arrives_at:ARRIVES_AT]->(arrival_airport:Airport {city:"Barcelona"})
MATCH (flight)-[operates:OPERATES]-(airline:Airline)
MATCH (flight)-[uses_gate:USES_GATE]->(gate:Gate)
RETURN departure_airport, departs_from, flight, arrives_at, arrival_airport, operates, airline, uses_gate, gate, airline.name, gate.number
Rewrite: Which carriers operate Airbus A380 flights from Tokyo to Barcelona, and what are the designated gate numbers for these flights?

Question: Can you find all the last names of passengers who made a reservation for a flight departing from Berlin in December 2023 and their ticket price was above 500 USD?
Cypher:
MATCH (passenger:Passenger)-[booked:BOOKED_ON]->(reservation:Reservation)-[contains:CONTAINS_TICKET]->(ticket:Ticket)-[ticketFor:TICKET_FOR_FLIGHT]->(flight:Flight)
MATCH (flight)-[departs:DEPARTS_FROM]->(departureAirport:Airport {city:"Berlin"})
WHERE departs.scheduledDeparture >= datetime("2023-12-01T00:00:00") AND departs.scheduledDeparture < datetime("2024-01-01T00:00:00")
      AND ticket.price > 500
RETURN passenger, booked, reservation, contains, ticket, ticketFor, flight, departs, departureAirport, passenger.lastName
Rewrite: Could you locate the surnames of passengers who booked tickets for flights leaving Berlin in December 2023 with ticket prices exceeding 500 USD?

Question: What is the scheduled and actual departure times of flights operated by 'Pacific Airways' leaving from Seoul to Los Angeles in August 2023?
Cypher:
MATCH (departure_airport:Airport {city:"Seoul"})<-[depart:DEPARTS_FROM]-(flight:Flight)<-[operate:OPERATES]-(airline:Airline {name:"Pacific Airways"})
MATCH (flight)-[arrive:ARRIVES_AT]->(arrival_airport:Airport {city:"Los Angeles"})
WHERE depart.scheduledDeparture >= datetime("2023-08-01T00:00:00") AND depart.scheduledDeparture < datetime("2023-09-01T00:00:00")
RETURN departure_airport, depart, flight, operate, airline, arrive, arrival_airport, depart.scheduledDeparture, depart.actualDeparture
Rewrite: What are the planned and actual departure times for 'Pacific Airways' flights departing from Seoul to Los Angeles in August 2023?

Question: Can you detail the names of the terminals where flights numbered 'BA256' and 'LH432' depart from Heathrow airport, including the scheduled departure time?
Cypher:
MATCH (departure_airport:Airport {name:"Heathrow"})-[departure:DEPARTS_FROM]->(flight:Flight)-[uses:USES_GATE]->(gate:Gate)<-[has:HAS_TERMINAL]-(airport:Airport)
WHERE flight.number IN ["BA256", "LH432"]
RETURN departure_airport, departure, flight, uses, gate, has, airport, has.terminalName, departure.scheduledDeparture
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (departure_airport:Airport {name:"Heathrow"})-[departure:DEPARTS_FROM]-(flight:Flight)-[uses:USES_GATE]->(gate:Gate)<-[has:HAS_TERMINAL]-(airport:Airport)
WHERE flight.number IN ["BA256", "LH432"]
RETURN departure_airport, departure, flight, uses, gate, has, airport, has.terminalName, departure.scheduledDeparture
Rewrite: Could you provide the terminal names and the scheduled departure times for flights 'BA256' and 'LH432' from Heathrow airport?

Question: Could you provide the baggage allowance for the ticket class 'Economy Plus' on the flight number 'AA101' and its associated passenger's nationality?
Cypher:
MATCH (ticket:Ticket {class:"Economy Plus"})-[ticketForFlight:TICKET_FOR_FLIGHT]->(flight:Flight {number:"AA101"})
MATCH (passenger:Passenger)-[:BOOKED_ON]->(:Reservation)-[:CONTAINS_TICKET]->(ticket)
RETURN ticket, ticketForFlight, flight, passenger, ticketForFlight.baggageAllowance, passenger.nationality
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (ticket:Ticket {class:"Economy Plus"})-[ticketForFlight:TICKET_FOR_FLIGHT]->(flight:Flight {number:"AA101"})
MATCH (passenger:Passenger)-[relation5:BOOKED_ON]->(node3:Reservation)-[relation6:CONTAINS_TICKET]->(ticket)
RETURN relation6, relation5, node3, ticket, ticketForFlight, flight, passenger, ticketForFlight.baggageAllowance, passenger.nationality
Rewrite: Can you inform me about the luggage limits for the 'Economy Plus' ticket class on flight 'AA101' and the nationality of the corresponding passenger?

Question: List the booking agents who booked flights for passengers named 'John Doe' on flights arriving at Paris Charles de Gaulle in January 2024, specifying each agent's associated airline.
Cypher:
MATCH (arrivalAirport:Airport {name: "Paris Charles de Gaulle"})<-[arrives:ARRIVES_AT]-(flight:Flight)<-[ticketFor: TICKET_FOR_FLIGHT]-(ticket:Ticket)-[inReservation:CONTAINS_TICKET]-(reservation:Reservation)<-[booked:BOOKED_ON]-(passenger:Passenger {firstName: "John", lastName: "Doe"})
MATCH (airline:Airline)-[operates:OPERATES]->(flight)
WHERE arrives.scheduledArrival >= datetime('2024-01-01T00:00:00') AND arrives.scheduledArrival < datetime('2024-02-01T00:00:00')
RETURN passenger, booked, reservation, inReservation, ticket, ticketFor, flight, arrives, arrivalAirport, operates, airline, booked.bookingAgent, airline.name
Rewrite: Provide the names of the booking agents who arranged travel for individuals named 'John Doe' on flights scheduled to land at Paris Charles de Gaulle in January 2024, along with the airlines each agent represents.

Question: For flights arriving at Singapore Changi Airport in March 2024, could you determine the total delay in actual arrival time as compared to the scheduled arrival time?
Cypher:
MATCH (arrival_airport:Airport)<-[arrives_at:ARRIVES_AT]-(flight:Flight)
WHERE arrival_airport.name="Singapore Changi Airport" AND arrives_at.scheduledArrival >= datetime("2024-03-01T00:00:00") AND arrives_at.scheduledArrival < datetime("2024-04-01T00:00:00")
RETURN arrival_airport, arrives_at, flight, arrives_at.actualArrival - arrives_at.scheduledArrival
Rewrite: Could you calculate the overall delay in actual versus scheduled arrival times for flights reaching Singapore Changi Airport in March 2024?

Question: What are the actual and scheduled arrival times, along with the terminal names and gate numbers, for all flights that landed at JFK airport on New Year's Day 2023?
Cypher:
MATCH (arriving_airport:Airport {name: "JFK"})<-[arrives:ARRIVES_AT]-(flight:Flight)-[uses:USES_GATE]->(gate:Gate)
MATCH (gate)-[has_terminal:HAS_TERMINAL]->(airport:Airport)
WHERE date(arrives.actualArrival) = date('2023-01-01')
RETURN arriving_airport, arrives, flight, uses, gate, has_terminal, airport, arrives.actualArrival, arrives.scheduledArrival, has_terminal.terminalName, gate.number
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (arriving_airport:Airport {name: "JFK"})<-[arrives:ARRIVES_AT]-(flight:Flight)-[uses:USES_GATE]->(gate:Gate)
MATCH (gate)-[has_terminal:HAS_TERMINAL]-(airport:Airport)
WHERE date(arrives.actualArrival) = date('2023-01-01')
RETURN arriving_airport, arrives, flight, uses, gate, has_terminal, airport, arrives.actualArrival, arrives.scheduledArrival, has_terminal.terminalName, gate.number
Rewrite: For all the flights that arrived at JFK airport on New Year's Day 2023, what were the real and planned arrival times, the names of the terminals, and the gate numbers?

Question: What is the average distance flown by flights originating from Berlin Tegel airport and landing in any airport in the UK within the last year?
Cypher:
MATCH (originAirport:Airport {city: "Berlin", name: "Berlin Tegel"}), 
      (destinationAirport:Airport {country: "UK"}),
      (flight:Flight)-[departs:DEPARTS_FROM]->(originAirport),
      (flight)-[arrives:ARRIVES_AT]->(destinationAirport)
WHERE departs.scheduledDeparture.year = date().year - 1
RETURN AVG(flight.distance)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (originAirport:Airport {name: "Berlin Tegel"})-[relation3:DEPARTS_FROM]->(flight:Flight)-[relation4:ARRIVES_AT]->(destinationAirport:Airport {country: "UK"})
WHERE flight.scheduledDeparture >= datetime({year: date().year - 1})
RETURN AVG(flight.distance)
Rewrite: What is the typical flight distance for journeys starting at Berlin Tegel airport and arriving at any UK airport over the past year?

Question: Can you calculate the sum of all first-class ticket prices booked by passengers holding an American nationality for flights departing in December 2023?
Cypher:
MATCH (passenger:Passenger {nationality:"American"})-[book:BOOKED_ON]->(reservation:Reservation)-[contains:CONTAINS_TICKET]->(ticket:Ticket {class:"First"})-[forFlight:TICKET_FOR_FLIGHT]->(flight:Flight)-[departs:DEPARTS_FROM]->(airport:Airport)
WHERE departs.scheduledDeparture.year = 2023 AND departs.scheduledDeparture.month = 12
RETURN SUM(ticket.price)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (passenger:Passenger {nationality: "American"})-[relation5:BOOKED_ON]->(reservation:Reservation)-[relation6:CONTAINS_TICKET]->(ticket:Ticket {class: "First"})-[relation7:TICKET_FOR_FLIGHT]->(flight:Flight)-[relation8:DEPARTS_FROM]->(airport:Airport)
WHERE flight.scheduledDeparture.year = 2023 AND flight.scheduledDeparture.month = 12
RETURN SUM(ticket.price)
Rewrite: Could you compute the total cost of first-class tickets purchased by American passengers for flights leaving in December 2023?

Question: What is the maximum flight duration among all flights taken by the passengers who have traveled between San Francisco and Tokyo since 2022?
Cypher:
MATCH (departureAirport:Airport {city: "San Francisco"}), (arrivalAirport:Airport {city: "Tokyo"})
MATCH (flight:Flight)-[departs:DEPARTS_FROM]->(departureAirport)
MATCH (flight)-[arrives:ARRIVES_AT]->(arrivalAirport)
MATCH (ticket:Ticket)-[ticketFor:TICKET_FOR_FLIGHT]->(flight)
MATCH (passenger:Passenger)-[:BOOKED_ON]->(:Reservation)-[:CONTAINS_TICKET]->(ticket)
WHERE departs.scheduledDeparture.year >= 2022
RETURN MAX(flight.duration)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (departureAirport:Airport {city: "San Francisco"}), (arrivalAirport:Airport {city: "Tokyo"})
MATCH (flight:Flight)-[departs:DEPARTS_FROM]->(departureAirport)
MATCH (flight)-[arrives:ARRIVES_AT]->(arrivalAirport)
MATCH (ticket:Ticket)-[ticketFor:TICKET_FOR_FLIGHT]->(flight)
MATCH (passenger:Passenger)-[relation9:BOOKED_ON]->(node5:Reservation)-[relation10:CONTAINS_TICKET]->(ticket)
WHERE departs.scheduledDeparture.year >= 2022
RETURN MAX(flight.duration)
Rewrite: What is the longest flight duration for any flight undertaken by passengers traveling between San Francisco and Tokyo starting from 2022?

Question: How many tickets were booked for flights from Dubai to New York by passengers with Canadian nationality in the second quarter of 2023?
Cypher:
MATCH (departureAirport:Airport {city: "Dubai"}), 
      (arrivalAirport:Airport {city: "New York"}),
      (passenger:Passenger {nationality: "Canadian"}),
      (passenger)-[booked:BOOKED_ON]->(reservation:Reservation)-[contains:CONTAINS_TICKET]->(ticket:Ticket),
      (ticket)-[ticketFor:TICKET_FOR_FLIGHT]->(flight:Flight),
      (flight)-[departs:DEPARTS_FROM]->(departureAirport),
      (flight)-[arrives:ARRIVES_AT]->(arrivalAirport)
WHERE departs.scheduledDeparture.year = 2023 
      AND departs.scheduledDeparture.month >= 4 
      AND departs.scheduledDeparture.month <= 6
RETURN COUNT(ticket)
Rewrite: In the second quarter of 2023, how many flight tickets were reserved by Canadian nationals for travel from Dubai to New York?

Question: Could you compute the average baggage allowance for all tickets sold under the 'Economy' class for flights from New Delhi to Sydney in 2023?
Cypher:
MATCH (originAirport:Airport {city:"New Delhi"}), (destinationAirport:Airport {city:"Sydney"})
MATCH (flight:Flight)-[departs:DEPARTS_FROM]->(originAirport),
      (flight)-[arrives:ARRIVES_AT]->(destinationAirport)
MATCH (ticket:Ticket {class:"Economy"})-[ticketFor:TICKET_FOR_FLIGHT]->(flight)
WHERE departs.scheduledDeparture.year = 2023 AND arrives.scheduledArrival.year = 2023
RETURN AVG(ticketFor.baggageAllowance)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (departureAirport:Airport {city: "New Delhi"}), (arrivalAirport:Airport {city: "Sydney"})
MATCH (flight:Flight)-[departs:DEPARTS_FROM]->(departureAirport), 
      (flight)-[arrives:ARRIVES_AT]->(arrivalAirport)
WHERE departs.scheduledDeparture.year = 2023
MATCH (ticket:Ticket {class: "Economy"})-[relation6:TICKET_FOR_FLIGHT]->(flight)
RETURN AVG(ticket.baggageAllowance)
Rewrite: Can you calculate the mean luggage weight permitted for every ticket issued in the 'Economy' section on 2023 flights departing from New Delhi to Sydney?

Question: Find the count of gates used at London Heathrow airport in July 2023 for flights operated by European airlines.
Cypher:
MATCH (airport:Airport {name: "London Heathrow"})-[:HAS_TERMINAL]->(gate:Gate)<-[:USES_GATE]-(flight:Flight),
      (flight)<-[:OPERATES]-(airline:Airline {headquarters: "Europe"}),
      (flight)-[departure:DEPARTS_FROM]->(:Airport)
WHERE departure.scheduledDeparture.year = 2023 AND departure.scheduledDeparture.month = 7
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT gate) AS gateCount
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (airport:Airport {name: "London Heathrow"})-[relation5:HAS_TERMINAL]->(gate:Gate)<-[relation6:USES_GATE]-(flight:Flight),
      (flight)<-[relation7:OPERATES]-(airline:Airline {headquarters: "Europe"}),
      (flight)-[departure:DEPARTS_FROM]->(node4:Airport)
WHERE departure.scheduledDeparture.year = 2023 AND departure.scheduledDeparture.month = 7
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT gate) AS gateCount
Rewrite: Determine how many gates were utilized at London Heathrow airport in July 2023 for flights conducted by European carriers.
